channel.title: Science on Casual Inference
channel.description: Recent content in Science on Casual Inference

item.title: #TidyTuesday: Meteorite landings
item.description: #TidyTuesday is a weekly data project for R users to practice data wrangling and visualization skills. Users work on a new dataset released each Tuesday, and then share their work. This week’s edition (Tidy Tuesday 24) is a dataset of meteorite landings from NASA. It’s a pretty hectic week for me, so I decided to make a single visualization. The dataset consists of location data for each meteorite found up until 2013.
